  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770205376</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Telling Stories: Marc Bamuthi Joseph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Erklären Von von Geschichten: Treber 
Bamuthi Joseph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Dire des Histoires : Marc Bamuthi Joseph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Dizendo Histórias: Marc Bamuthi Joseph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Dire Alle Storia: Vinaccia Bamuthi Joseph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ιστορίες αφήγησης: Θ*Μαρθ Bamuthi Joseph</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Contar Historias: Orujo Bamuthi José</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">Four-time National Poetry Slam winner Marc Bamuthi Joseph is a modern day griot (African storyteller) who tells his original stories through a combination of acting, spoken word, movement and rap. This Educator Guide addresses spoken word, autobiography, and performance art.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <coverage>
            <string language="en">North America</string>
          </coverage>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vier-Zeit sind nationale Poesie-Knallsieger Treber
Bamuthi Joseph ein modernes Taggriot (afrikanisches storyteller) das 
seine ursprünglichen Geschichten durch eine Kombination des 
Fungierens, des gesprochenen Wortes, der Bewegung und des Pochens 
erklärt. Diese Erzieher-Anleitung adressiert gesprochenes Wort,
Autobiographie und Leistung kunst.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le marc national Bamuthi Joseph de gagnant de 
claquement de poésie de Quatre-temps est un griot moderne de jour 
(storyteller africain) qui indique ses histoires initiales par une 
combinaison de l'action, du mot parlé, du mouvement et du coup sec et
dur. Ce guide d'éducateur adresse le mot, l'autobiographie, et 
l'art parlés d'exécution.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">o marc nacional Bamuthi Joseph do vencedor do slam
da poesia do Quatro-tempo é um griot moderno do dia (storyteller 
africano) que diga suas histórias originais com uma combinação de 
agir, de palavra falada, de movimento e de batida. Esta guia do 
educador dirige-se à palavra, ao autobiography, e à arte falados do 
desempenho.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la vinaccia nazionale Bamuthi Joseph del vincitore
di slam di poesia di Quattro-tempo è un griot moderno di giorno 
(storyteller africano) che dice alle sue storia originali con una 
combinazione comportarsi, della parola, del movimento e del colpo 
secco. Questa guida dell'educatore richiama la parola, il 
autobiography e l'arte parlati di prestazioni.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Νικητής Marc Bamuthi Joseph βρόντου 
τέσσερις-χρονικής ο εθνικός ποίησης είναι μια σύγχρονη ημέρα 
griot (αφρικανικό storyteller) που λέει τις αρχικές ιστορίες
του μέσω ενός συνδυασμού να ενεργήσει, προφορικής λέξης, 
μετακίνησης και κτυπήματος. Αυτός ο οδηγός εκπαιδευτικών 
εξετάζει την προφορική λέξη, την αυτοβιογραφία, και την τέχνη 
απόδοσης.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">el orujo nacional Bamuthi José del ganador del 
golpe de la poesía del Cuatro-tiempo es un griot moderno del día 
(storyteller africano) que cuenta sus historias originales con una 
combinación de actuar, de la palabra hablada, del movimiento y del 
rap. Esta guía del educador trata palabra, la autobiografía, y
el arte hablados del funcionamiento.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Menschlichkeit</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Sciences humaines</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Humanities</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Studi umanistici</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Ανθρωπότητες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Humanidad</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
